chunk:
Ere Perez Quandong Green Booster Serum

Brand: Ere Perez

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: aqua, glycerin, levulinic acid, sodium levulinate, santalum acuminatum (quandong) fruit extract, medicago sativa (alfalfa) leaf extract, rubus idaeus (raspberry) seed oil, spinacia oleracea (spinach) leaf extract, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed o

nsis (jojoba) seed oil, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, chlorophyllin-copper complex, lactic acid, p-anisic acid, sodium hyaluronate, resveratrol, caprylhydroxamic acid, tocopherol (vitamin e), xanthan gum.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicit
